Articles.Content:
Does anyone have a working version of KSC-Switcher that works on stock Kerbin with 1.3.1? I found a version that works for 1.2.2, and whilst it works in 1.3.1, there are no new KSC launch locations. I found another site that has a screenshot of them working on Kerbin, but the download link is broken.

I also know Kerbin-side exist but I like how KSC-Switcher works, and the fact that it doesn't have any extra buildings, considerably more over Kerbin-side.

Edited November 5, 2017 by Jalaris
typos

Download Real Solar System and grab the KSCSwitcher file from the archive. You may have to alter the script to target Kerbin, not sure, I haven't had my fingers in KSCSwitcher for some time so I don't know how much, if anything, has changed in the RSS Kopernicus era. Either way, I do recall that the decision was made to separate the launch sites from the main KSCSwitcher repo, likely for interoperability reasons, although I'm not sure why you'd use KSCSwitcher on Kerbin when Kerbinside is available (low RAM, I guess?)
GPP also has repackaged Switcher with it.
